review_title: IDk what the bad reviews are about
one_reviews_text: Its a lot of fun. Repetitive, but still doesn't get boring as the scenario changes (night/day/ one, two, three lane traffic/ oncoming trafic) . Lots of bikes to upgrade to. It is a blast and has great potential as there are not many good racing/driving games for VR. Driving mechanics could be a little better, but I enjoyed it a lot. Also, please impletment a way to center the view of the headset. The bike is always offcenter and I have to move physically to reach the handles.
Total waste of money event at 1$, don't touch this!
review_feedback: Thanks for the review, sad that you didn't like it. If you could elaborate what were you expecting just let us know, and remember that you can ask for a refund if you haven't played the game that much!

review_title: It's not as bad as the review scores
one_reviews_text: This isn't what I would call a good game. However, I don't think it's all that bad and it can be fun. I got it for .99 cents USD and think it was worth it. It's a simple arcade bike racing game. You grab the handle bars and then use your motion controllers like you had an imaginary steering wheel to guide your bike across the arcade-like simple tracks. The only thing that I did not like, was how grindy the game is to get upgrades or buy a new bike. See my review & gameplay here: https://youtu.be/zF7F_OyiTsE
review_feedback: Hey man, thanks for the review. Indeed we got some mixed ratings and tried to help everyone who had troubles, but it is hard to please all. I too think the grinding is too much and probably will be updating that in a next version. Cheers!

one_reviews_text: Super fun arcade VR game, just get on the bike and trigger it. Hope they can put some buggy or quads too.
review_feedback: Thanks man! Glad you liked it!
